errors.error_description: Removed the leading slash from the flowchart image path, making it a relative path that may not exist
correction_candidates: Change flowchart.png to /flowchart.png to use absolute path
Change flowchart.png to ./flowchart.png for explicit relative path
Change flowchart.png to images/flowchart.png assuming it's in an images directory
Change flowchart.png to docs/flowchart.png assuming it's in a docs directory
errors.golden_answer: Change flowchart.png to /flowchart.png to use absolute path
